name: Vertical Collapse
description:
Vertical Collapse is a digital pinball game with an inverted twist.

A menacing ghost has hacked the machine! See if you can locate the portal that sends you to its domain and take it out!

CONTROLS:

Left and Right arrow keys: L and R flippers

Space: Both flippers at the same time

Down arrow key and Shift: PlungerBat the ball around the board and bash into the components to rack up a high score! Some components on the board are breakable... see what happens when different things break!

CREDITS:

Game developed by Lamp Lighter Studios using Godot Engine, Aseprite, and Chiptone.

Milo - Art and Design

Sofox - Programming and Sound Effects

Monty - Programming and Animations

Awesomoey - Production and Page design

Music recorded and mixed by Samadhi.

Thanks everyone for playing!!
